nodes.text: The Sluis Van Outer Starfighter Base was a New Republic military installation located near Sluis Van in the Sluis sector of the Outer Rim Territories. Although primarily used as a starfighter base, flight instruction was also undertaken at the installation. Noell Ciro, a trainee from the planet Dolomar, underwent pilot training at the Sluis Van Outer Starfighter Base, qualifying for active military service in the New Republic Starfighter Corps in 4 ABY.
The Sluis Van Outer Starfighter Base was referenced in Noell Ciro's biography in The DarkStryder Campaign sourcebook published by West End Games in 1995.
